original_text: Everything that is written in the Bible comes from God's Spirit. It helps us in many ways. The Bible teaches us what is true. It warns us when we are doing wrong things. It shows us what is right. It teaches us how to live good lives.
korean_text: 모든 성경은 하나님의 감동으로 된 것으로 교훈과 책망과 바르게 함과 의로 교육하기에 유익하니

sentences.original_text: Everything that is written in the Bible
It helps us in many ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여러 가지 방법으로 우리를 도와줍니다

sentences.original_text: The Bible teaches us what is true
It warns us when we are doing wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리가 잘못된 것을 할 때 경고해줍니다

sentences.original_text: It shows us what is right
It teaches us how to live good lives
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리에게 어떻게 선한 삶을 살아야 하는지 가르쳐줍니다
